dmca.title: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: Logo infringements - FAPL_NRID9770
dmca.body:
Please note that the web site referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 5:08:21 p.m. (GMT-6) on March 7, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2006 7:58 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: Logo infringements - FAPL_NRID9770

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Tuesday, March 07, 2006
at
04:53:34 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] FA Premier League: Logo infringements - FAPL_NRID9770

MESSAGE BODY:
NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPL_NRID9770

Please quote the above FAPL_NRID9770 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue.

We write on behalf of The FA Premier League, in respect of certain
intellectual property rights including football Club Crests.

We have noticed that your website, http://www.onemanutd.com/  is displaying
The FA Premier League's clubs' crests.

We wish to make you aware that we have a good faith belief that your present
use is an infringement of the The FA Premier League's legal rights and that
all such unauthorised use must cease immediately. Please confirm by return
your agreement to this and give your undertaking to cease all such
infringements on any and all of your web sites. Pending your response the FA
Premier League's rights are fully reserved.

We thank you for your cooperation.

Yours sincerely,
Tim Cooper
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA

Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1730
Fax:
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.


--------------------------------------------------------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
